title: With the Patriots win on Sunday, a quarterback controversy may be brewing
dc:creator: WBUR
description: With third-string rookie quarterback Bailey Zappe leading the team to victory over the Detroit Lions, we check in on whether there's a quarterback controversy brewing in New England. WBUR's Chris Citorik joins us with the latest.
